com.marcosgarciacasado.pem

Class ProcessEvent

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • com.marcosgarciacasado.pem.ProcessEvent

  • public class ProcessEvent
extends java.util.Observable
    Manages an event associated with a process. Contains the information of the regular expression which activates the event and the new status of the process at the event activation.
    See Also:
    Observable, Observer, ObservableProcess, ProcessStatus
     

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private java.lang.String regexp
      Regular expression which activates the event.
      private ProcessStatus status
      New status of the event.

      Constructor of the process event, passing the regular expression by argument.
      ProcessEvent(java.lang.String regexp, ProcessStatus status)
      Constructor of the process event, passing the regular expression and the status by argument.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void activateEvent()
      Informs the observers about the activation of the event.
      void activateEvent(java.lang.String line)
      Conditionally activates the event, whether the string passed by argument matches it's regular expression.

      Obtains the regular expression associated with this event.

      Sets the status of this event with the one given by argument.
